xmldoc.short_description: Evaluates an function on a cell.

syntax.syntax_item: [R1, ... , Rp] = cellfun(function_handle, ce1, ..., cep, name, value)

param_input_item.param_description: cells with p inputs required for function_handle.
'UniformOutput': true or false, 'ErrorHandler': a error function.

description.p: cellfun applies function to each cell elements.

example_item.example_item_description: functions to define for next example:
